item.title: GNB GL 750 Mini Netbook with Google Android
item.description: GNB showcased this netbook reviewed by Sascha for Netbook News at COMPUTEX 2009.

item.title: Mtube II XP Netbook and Android Tablet
item.description: The Mtube II is a combination of netbook and tablet PC running Windows XP in netbook and Google Android in tablet mode. Apart from the unfortunate netbook

item.title: Compal Snapdragon Netbook with Google Android
item.description: Nicolas from Tech Video Blog browses various Web sites on a Snapdragon-based netbook by Compal running Google Android in this video from COMPUTEX 2009.

item.title: Wistron N900z Smartbook with Freescale Processor
item.description: Low-end ARM-based netbooks or Smartbooks seem to be a hot trend at COMPUTEX 2009. The Wistron N900z is one such device powered by Freescale's i.MX515 multimedia

item.title: Snapdragon Based ASUS Eee PC Running Android
item.description: Whether a mobile computer with a 11.6 inch screen is still a netbook or rather a subnotebook is a question one can argue or just don't care about.
